.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx1030_ssrc_8dd4e0:

ssrc
====

Instruction input.

*Size:* 1 dword if wavefront size is 32, otherwise 2 dwords.

*Operands:* :ref:`s<amdgpu_synid_s>`, :ref:`vcc<amdgpu_synid_vcc>`, :ref:`ttmp<amdgpu_synid_ttmp>`, :ref:`null<amdgpu_synid_null>`
